name: Cards and Tankards Deckbuilder v2
description:
It's been a while, but IT'S BACK! The UNOFFICIAL external deck builder for Cards & Tankards! 

This isn't just a simple deck builder, however. A bunch of new functions have been added to make it easier than ever to save and share decks! 

New additions include: 

- Share decks with your friends with the deck import/export function
- Save your favorite decks for future reference
- Sort cards using filters, including faction toggles
- Search for specific cards with the search bar
- See every card available to you without having to switch factions
- Take a screenshot of your favorite decks, including mana curve and card counts

Credits

Programming: TonyBigBlind 
Design: MajorMayo
